Posts.Content: Try not to worry too much it won't do you any good, extremely hard I am sure, you need to be positive and strong you can fight this and win, I am a big believer in positive thinking. My thoughts and good wishes are with you. Keep posting there is plenty of support on here. Love Mary x x x x x
Posts.Title: Help, tests confirm 90% probable cancer

Posts.Content: Aussiesue, My thoughts are with you I really hope everything goes well, when are you having this done? please keep posting I shall be looking to see how you get on sending you lots of hugs and kisses love Mary x x x x
Posts.Title: Help, tests confirm 90% probable cancer

Posts.Content: Hi, I am so sorry I hope your tests results are good I am in exactly the same boat I have been to doctors this am and Have to go for a mamagram and byopsy, fingers crossed for both of us Mary x x
